answers.answer: Did they check your blood sugar?

This can be a serious sign of gestational diabetes hun, not to play doctor. I went through a short stint of drinking slot of fluids, always felt dry. My midwife was concerned and said to watch sugar intake. My glucose test is in a week or two. How far along are you ? I'm 27 weeks.

I did this too at around 24 ish weeks and it was because I had gestational diabetes but I didn't find out until I was 28 weeks. All I wanted was water water and more water. I drank four glasses right before bed every night it was so weird. But that's definitely a red flag for GD

question: sobjust starting today! I feel like I can't get enough to drink! I was drinking lots and lots of water a day but my doctor told me to decrease my water and increase my caffeine and salt intake b.c I am blacking out 4 times a weeks I'm also going to see a cardiologist later this week... I can't figure out why I am so thirsty or feel like I can't get enough to drink of something! I've tried water, coke, dr pepper, apple juice and still feel like I'm dying of thirst! What can I do?!
title: Weird question
